entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is lying awake in bed and wondering if he has Slytherin blood.

entities.name: salazar slytherin
entities.description: A founder of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Harry wonders if he could be a descendant of Salazar Slytherin.

entities.name: justin
entities.description: A classmate of Harry's in Herbology. He will be explained to by Harry the next day.

relationships.description: Harry wonders if he could be a descendant of Salazar Slytherin, as hinted at by his Parseltongue abilities and the Sorting Hat's decision to put him in Gryffindor.
